text: 5:20 Matyu 3:17; Jon 3:35; 2 Pita 1:17Afeziam bar Otarim gifonge, egha bizir a uabɨ amiba, a bar ada isa uan Otarimɨn aka. Afeziam kamaghsua, a ia damutɨ ia dɨgavir kuram damuam, kamaghɨn a ingangarir ekiar igharaziba sara uaghan uan Otarimɨn akagham, da ingangarir an amigha gɨvazibagh afiragham.
